text: Danilo Cirino de Oliveira (born 11 November 1986) is a Brazilian football player who plays for Nea Salamina. ==Club career== ===Sion=== In November 2011, Danilo started a trial training period at VfB Stuttgart, but he signed to Sion in January 2012. ===Aktobe=== On 31 March 2015, Danilo signed for Aktobe in the Kazakhstan Premier League. ===Chiangrai United=== On 10 March 2016, it was announced that Danilo would be joining Chiangrai United for the 2016 season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Pogoń Szczecin players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:1.
